scripts.watch: watchify main.js -o index-bundle.js user.js -o user-bundle.js world.js -o world-bundle.js convert-worker.js -o convert-worker-bundle.js world-worker.js -o world-worker-bundle.js
scripts.build: browserify main.js -o index-bundle.js && browserify user.js -o user-bundle.js && browserify world.js -o world-bundle.js  && browserify convert-worker.js -o convert-worker-bundle.js && browserify world-worker.js -o world-worker-bundle.js
